name: 2022 6th International Conference on Deep Learning Technologies
content: Publication: The ISBN number of ICDLT 2022 is 978-1-4503-9693-6\. You are invited to submit manuscript to ICDLT 2022\. The accepted paper will be included into ICDLT 2022 Conference Proceedings, which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, which will be archived in ACM Digital Library, and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
